exits.Water Temple Boss Door: can_use(Longshot) or can_hover or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and (can_mega or Megaton_Hammer))
exits.Dark Link Area:
(at('High Alcove', can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)) or 
                    (can_use(Hover_Boots) and (can_mega or Megaton_Hammer)))
                and (Small_Key_Water_Temple, 4)

exits.Boss Key Area:
is_adult and 
                (Small_Key_Water_Temple, 4)
                and (can_use(Longshot) or can_hover or Hover_Boots)

locations.Water Temple GS Behind Gate:
(can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_hover or can_use(Hookshot)) and 
                (can_jumpslash or has_explosives)

locations.Water Temple Cracked Wall Chest:
(can_use(Hookshot) and Iron_Boots) or
                (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and (can_use(Hookshot) or has_explosives))
locations.Water Temple Torches Chest:
(here(is_child and can_use(Sticks)) or has_fire_source or can_use(Bow))
                and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)

exits.Central Pillar:
can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and 
                ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5)
                or here(is_child and can_use(Sticks)) or has_fire_source or can_use(Bow))
exits.Boss Key Area:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 4) and
                (can_use(Longshot) or can_hover or can_use(Hover_Boots)) and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)
exits.Dragon Head Area: Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and (is_adult or can_child_attack) and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)
exits.Under Entrance Block:
can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and 
            ( (can_use(Hookshot) and can_mega) or (can_use(Bow) and (Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot)) 
                and (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or (can_use(Hookshot) and can_mega))))
exits.High Alcove:
(can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Hookshot) or (is_adult and can_mega) or can_hover)
                and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)

locations.Water Temple Central Pillar Chest:
can_use(Iron_Boots) and can_use(Hookshot) and
                (at('Central Pillar from Lobby', True) or can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby))
locations.Water Temple GS Central Pillar:
at('Central Pillar from Lobby', True) or
                can_use(Longshot) or
                at('High Alcove',
                    can_use(Farores_Wind) and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)
                    and (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang)))

exits.High Alcove:
(can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Hookshot) or (is_adult and can_mega) or can_hover
                or has_projectile(either))
            and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)

locations.Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest:
(is_adult or can_hover) and
                (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang) or can_mega)

exits.River: can_play(Song_of_Time) or (can_use(Hookshot) and (Hover_Boots or (Bombs and can_live_dmg(0.5))))

exits.River Chest: can_use(Bow) or (can_use(Longshot) and has_bottle and Iron_Boots)

locations.Water Temple Dragon Chest: at('River Chest', is_adult) or has_bombchus or (Iron_Boots and can_use(Hookshot))
